total_revenue.context: Q4 revenue of $10.0 billion, up 8% year-over-year and 9% in constant currency.

subscription_support_revenue.context: Subscription & support grew 8% nominal and 9% constant currency.

gaap_operating_margin.context: Q4 GAAP operating margin of 18.2%, up 70 bps year-over-year.

non_gaap_operating_margin.context: Q4 non-GAAP operating margin expanded to 33.1%, up 170 bps.

operating_cash_flow.context: Q4 operating cash flow of $3.97 billion, up 17%.

free_cash_flow.context: Q4 free cash flow of $3.82 billion, up 17%.

full_year_operating_cash_flow.context: FY25 operating cash flow of $13.1 billion, up 28%.

full_year_free_cash_flow.context: FY25 free cash flow of $12.4 billion, up 31%.

data_cloud_arr.context: Data Cloud and AI ARR reached $900 million, growing 120% YoY.

agentforce_deals.context: Since October, Salesforce closed 5,000 Agentforce deals including over 3,000 paid.

agentforce_cases.context: Agentforce handled 380,000 conversations on help.salesforce.com with an 84% resolution rate.

records_stored.context: Data Cloud surpassed 50 trillion records, doubling year-over-year.

current_rpo.context: Current RPO of $30.2 billion, up 9% YoY.

total_rpo.context: Total RPO of $63.4 billion, up 11% YoY.

multi_cloud_deals.context: Top 10 deals averaged six clouds, and nearly every top win included AI, Data Cloud, and Slack.

transformation.description: AI- and Data-driven transformation focused on digital labor, operating efficiency, and profitable growth.
initiatives: Delivering Agentforce as a unified AI agent platform across clouds.
Embedding Data Cloud to supply high-fidelity data for agents and Customer 360.
Expanding multi-cloud, industry, and international adoption while reorganizing the go-to-market.
results: Agentforce partner network expanded (AWS, Google, Workday, etc.).
Internal deployments include service, sales, and quoting automation with 75% faster cycles.
Slack featured in 1/3 of $1M+ deals with billions of weekly messages.

ecosystem.description: Growing a powerful partner ecosystem around Agentforce.
highlights: Partners involved in 50% of Agentforce wins and 70% of activations.
Over 127K integrators trained in Agentforce with 1,000+ ISVs building agents.

subscription_support_growth.context: Subscription and support revenue growth guidance.

share_repurchases.context: Executed $7.8 billion in share repurchases in FY25.

dividends.context: Paid $1.5 billion in dividends in FY25.

total_return.context: Returned $9.3 billion to shareholders in FY25.
